# Force (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Tharizdun]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power (Su):** By manipulating cosmic forces of inertia and force, once per day you can reroll any damage roll (for a weapon, a spell, or an ability) and take the better of the two rolls. This granted power is considered a supernatural ability.

**Force Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Mage Armor (Spell)|Mage Armor]]****:** Gives subject +4 armor bonus.

**2** **[[Magic Missile (Spell)|Magic Missile]]****:** 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).

**3 [[Blast of Force (Spell)|Blast of Force]]:** Ray deals 1d6 damage/2 caster levels (max 5d6).

**4** **[[Resilient Sphere (Spell)|Resilient Sphere]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Force globe protects but traps one subject.

**5** **[[Wall of Force (Spell)|Wall of Force]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Wall is immune to damage.

**6** **[[Repulsion (Spell)|Repulsion]]****:** Creatures canâ€™t approach you.

**7** **[[Forcecage (Spell)|Forcecage]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.

**8** **[[Telekinetic Sphere (Spell)|Telekinetic Sphere]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** As *[[Resilient Sphere (Spell)|resilient sphere]]**,* but you move sphere telekinetically.

**9** **[[Crushing Hand (Spell)|Crushing Hand]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 274 |
|---|---|

| | Lords of Madness (WotC), pg. 207 |
